pages.text: An excitable player have entered a new world. With terrain to traverse, structures to build, and creatures to slaughter, they view the new landscape and begin. The adventure starts the same as all before, by punching trees.

After a few sore punches they have collected enough wood to craft a basic set of tools. Upon delving beneath the colorful soil layer, the new stones remind the player that the new beauty extends downwards as well. But alas! The new stones do not yield cobblestone, how may they ever make new tools? Well, any harvest level 1 tool will suffice for advancing

pages.title: HL 0 Resources
pages.text: Materials available to the player at this stage include flint, antimony, tin, silver and gold. With these materials, the player crafts various harvest level 1 tools such as flint, pewter and colored golds. See HERE for further information on tools. The latter two tools mentioned require ALLOYING. Upon developing and training their alloying skills, the player sets out to find new materials to advance their work.
